channel.title: How do you're friends join you're moparscape server?
channel.description:
I am using moparscape webclient and i want my friends to join me. Would they just have to write in my server ip ( the number bellow username and password)
Kind regards
Elliot

item.title: How do you're friends join you're moparscape server?
item.dc:creator: @elliot291 elliot291
item.description:
@elliot291 wrote:

so, i just tell my friend the url of my no-ip.org?

eg; ownagePk.no-ip.biz

Elliot

Read full topic
item.source: How do you're friends join you're moparscape server?

item.title: How do you're friends join you're moparscape server?
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:6, topic:384373”]How do you are friends join you are moparscape server???

Your* not you’re.

Run the DUC, give you friends the host you registered on the No-IP website. Run the server on port 43594 and link them to http://www.moparisthebest.com/. Tell them to then enter the host you gave them into the MoparScape client.

DUC is shit. You don’t even need it.[/quote]Sure you explain to him/her how to set up a static IP. Enjoy.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you're friends join you're moparscape server?

@Epic_Steve wrote:

How do you are friends join you are moparscape server???

Your* not you’re.

Wintercanon:

Run the DUC, give you friends the host you registered on the No-IP website. Run the server on port 43594 and link them to http://www.moparisthebest.com/. Tell them to then enter the host you gave them into the MoparScape client.

DUC is shit. You don’t even need it.
